availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Napoleon Roberts (Louisville, Kentucky, resident and cabin boy)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident and cabin boy. Kentucky native. Son of George and Lucinda Roberts. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Cabin boy in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Charged with murder in Louisville, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 439A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 725.
KYR-0001-004-3053
